name: Scrying Mirror
text: Uses (4 secrets). [reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Scrying Mirror and spend 1 secret: Perform the "reveal chaos token" step of the test now (before committing cards), instead of after committing cards.

name: Azure Flame
text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 1 damage.

name: Clairvoyance
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 1 horror.

name: Crystal Pendulum
text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Crystal Pendulum: Name a number. If this test succeeds by that nuber or fails by that number, draw 1 card.

flavor: Dark is the abyss without. Bright is the abyss within.
name: Robes of Endless Night
text: [reaction] When you play a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Robes of Endless Night: Reduce the cost of that card by 1. Playing that card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Ineffable Truth
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +2 [willpower] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 resource.

name: Recharge
text: Choose a [[Spell]] or [[Relic]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location and reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, add 1 charge to the chosen asset. Otherwise, add 4 charges to the chosen asset.
